mapper.select: select c.num, nickname, subject, content, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date, hitcount, status, user_num, TO_CHAR(sdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS sdate, TO_CHAR(edate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS edate, gender, total_people, current_people, estimate_cost from companion c join companion_info ci on c.num=ci.num where c.num=#{num}
select theme from companion_theme where num=#{num}
select region_main AS mainRegion, region_sub AS subRegion from companion_region where num=#{num}
select age from companion_age where num=#{num}

select c.num, nickname, subject, content, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date, hitcount, status, user_num, TO_CHAR(sdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS sdate, TO_CHAR(edate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS edate, gender, total_people, current_people, estimate_cost from companion c join companion_info ci on c.num=ci.num order by reg_date DESC, subject ASC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
select distinct num from companion_region where region_main=#{mainRegion}

select c.num, nickname, subject, content, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date, hitcount, status, user_num, TO_CHAR(sdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS sdate, TO_CHAR(edate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS edate, gender, total_people, current_people, estimate_cost from companion c join companion_info ci on c.num=ci.num join (select distinct num from companion_region where region_main=#{mainRegion}) r ON c.num=r.num OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
select COUNT(*) FROM companion c join (select distinct num from companion_region where region_main=#{mainRegion}) r ON c.num=r.num
